title: runtime: unexpected return pc for runtime.main called from 0x0
body:
What steps will reproduce the problem?

package main

import "runtime"

func main() {
	defer func() {
		runtime.GC() // triggers stack walk
		recover()
	}()
	func() { var i *int; _ = *i }()
}

What is the expected output? What do you see instead?

Expected: nothing, this is what we get on amd64 (haven't tried 386, but assume it is the
same)

Got:
